featured.text: Dumas’s life sometimes was just like his action novels.
Dumas’s two most famous stories, The Three Musketeers and The Count of Monte Cristo, have inspired more than 100 films.

definition.zh_def: 杜馬，俄羅斯的立法機構，負責制定法律和監督政府。
definition.en_def: The Duma is the lower house of the Federal Assembly of Russia, responsible for enacting laws and overseeing the government.
definition.example: The Duma passed a new law to improve public transportation.
